name: Illuminants
description: Three archaeologists discover an ancient portal which releases an evil unto the world. They staged a coup of the largest human city, Vienna, where you live. Luckily you were able to escape into the sewers during the assault. Now you must make your way through the tunnels to the sewer docks, where a pirate has agreed to smuggle you for a large sum of money to the port town of Tribain.
